name: Chris-Ocyon: The Malediction
description:
Chrys Ocyon is a platformer game with thematic halloween and diversify between side-scroller, 2.5D and 3d elements with a difficulty a few high.

FEATURES

  • Gameplay Platformer Classic: in the style of games platformers PS1, like crash, gex, and others, you can use your spin, dash ou jump to defeat the enemies.
  • Time Dilation: Use the clock to dillating the time and access locals than you could can't.
  • Invert Gravity: Use the magnet to control gravity and walk for the roof.
  • Crystal: Crystals are good to change objects/enemies for another dimension .
  • Magic Spoons: You can fly for a few amount of time.
  • Run on the wall 
  • Jump between walls
  • The game have some options graphics and lock/free fps.

DEVELOPER NOTE

(any curiositys about that project and me)

  • this is the first game developed by me, beucase i choose that genre, by simplicity.
  • I'm working alone in my free time.
  • I starded study blender/unreal engine at 6 months ago and want share my progress.
  • I develop my game while I learn.
  • It's a brazilian project.
  • I'm very fan of crash bandicoot, a lot of people will see similaraty with the franchise.
